item.title: The Digital Pigeon
item.description: Ever wonder how To know more how email system works in reality, in bits and bytes, read about the digital pigeon! Thanks to sayan at making these concepts more palpable at Pycon India 2018. if you also wonder about how things work, you might like my other blogs on the same. How dns works? How Internet works How linux boots How encryption works? It’s just multiplexing
